content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to activate the arcgis environment using various paths, but all resulted in errors. Recently, I tried multiple paths again and received error messages indicating that certain files or directories were missing. These paths included /home/katmai/anaconda3/bin/activate, /home/katmai/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh, /opt/anaconda3/bin/activate, /opt/miniconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh, /opt/anaconda/etc/profile.d/conda.sh, ~/miniconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh, ~/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh, /root/miniconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh, /root/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh, /home/kat/anaconda3/bin/activate, /usr/local/anaconda3/bin/activate.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "bash -c \'source /opt/conda/bin/activate && conda activate arcgis && python -c \\"import arcgis; print(arcgis.__version__)\\"\'"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'bash: line 1: /opt/conda/bin/activate: No such file or directory\\n'", type='action_result')]
"""
